short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get this extension to detect colors on webpages, images and fonts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web designers are responsible for creating attractive designs and layouts for websites. Selecting the right color codes is very important for any website. The colors play an important part in keeping readers engaged with the content. Colorzilla helps web designers pick and find the right color values for their projects. This tool can save a lot of time and effort for Web designers. With this tool, users can pick RGB and HEX color values and copy and save them wherever they need to. 

Key Features 
-Color code identifier with 100% accuracy 
-Simple to use  
-Copy color code feature lets users save and paste color codes easily 
-Identify image color codes with zero errors
